forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Password reset assistance
forgotPassword.description: For security reasons, password resets must be initiated by an administrator. Submit a request below and an administrator will assist you.

instructions.title: How it works:
instructions.step1: Submit your email and request below
instructions.step2: An administrator will receive your request
instructions.step3: The admin will contact you with reset instructions
instructions.step4: Follow the instructions to set your new password

requestForm.title: Request Password Reset
requestForm.description: Enter your email address to request a password reset. An administrator will be notified and will contact you shortly.
requestForm.reasonPlaceholder: Briefly describe why you need a password reset (e.g., forgot password, account access issue)

success.title: Request Sent Successfully!
success.description: Your password reset request has been submitted to the system administrator.
success.nextSteps: An administrator will review your request and contact you via your registered email with further instructions. This usually takes a few minutes to a few hours.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.emailNotFound: This email is not registered in the system
errors.requestFailed: Failed to send request. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

contactInfo.title: Need Help?
contactInfo.description: If you're unable to reach your administrator or need immediate assistance, please contact our support team.

overview.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface

security.passwordAuthDescription: Manage your password and authentication settings

recommendations.strongPassword: Use a strong, unique password with at least 8 characters

recommendations.logoutShared: Log out from shared devices after use

alerts.passwordChangeRequiredDescription: Your password needs to be changed. Please update it in the Security tab.
